a.title: Hand holding iPad with various educational icons appearing. Educational resources online now.

img.title: #8b74c5123c39407a82d661d0a6e9ece6
img.alt: Hand holding iPad with various educational icons appearing. Educational resources online now.

div.p: Educational resources are now available for families!

p.span: Our mission is to ensure an excellent education for all students. We make every effort to produce a high-quality education system that continues to foster our sense of pride and promotes excellence for all. Royal School District includes one preschool, one elementary (Kindergarten-3rd), one intermediate school (4th-6th), one middle school (7th-8th) and one high school (9th-12th). Living in rural Central Washington offers the experience of a friendly and tight-knit community with tremendous support for our schools. We boast gorgeous views of farmland and varied terrain. There is an abundant variety of outdoor activities all within an hour’s drive, including water and snow skiing, boating, hunting, fishing, biking, and other river and lake activities.
